original_text: Him would Paul have to go forth with him; and took and circumcised him because of the Jews which were in those quarters: for they knew all that his father was a Greek.
korean_text: 바울이 그를 데리고 떠나고자 할새 그 지역에 있는 유대인으로 말미암아 그를 데려다가 할례를 행하니 이는 그 사람들이 그의 아버지는 헬라인인 줄 다 앎이러라

sentences.original_text: Him would Paul have to go forth with him
because of the Jews which were in those quarters
for they knew all that his father was a Greek
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 아버지가 헬라인인 것을 모두 알고 있었습니다
